name: IPBan
description: Since 2011, IPBan is the worlds most trusted, free security software to block hackers and botnets. With both Windows and Linux support, IPBan has your dedicated or cloud server protected. Upgrade to IPBan Pro today and get a discount. Learn more at â†“
readme_summary: IPBan is a free, open-source security software for Windows and Linux that automatically blocks IP addresses attempting to gain unauthorized access to servers. It monitors system logs and event viewers for failed login attempts and uses firewall rules to ban malicious IPs, protecting servers from hackers and botnets.
key_features: Auto ban IP addresses by detecting failed logins from event viewer and/or log files
Supports monitoring for SSH on Linux, and RDP, OpenSSH, VNC, MySQL, SQL Server, Exchange, SmarterMail, MailEnable on Windows
Highly configurable thresholds for failed login counts and ban durations
Fast banning mechanism, with optional polling intervals for log files
Easy unbanning via an unban.txt file
Precompiled binaries available for download, eliminating .NET SDK dependency on servers
primary_use_case: Protecting servers (dedicated or cloud) on Windows and Linux from brute-force attacks and unauthorized access by automatically banning malicious IP addresses.
cover_image_prompt: A vigilant digital knight, clad in armor made of glowing firewall icons, standing guard before a server rack. The knight holds a shield that deflects incoming arrows, each arrow representing a malicious IP address attempting to breach the server. Successful deflections create a cascade of harmless digital sparks. Small, subtle UI elements showing IP addresses being added to a ban list float around the knight. The background is a dark, secure digital landscape with the 'IPBan' logo subtly integrated into the knight's shield. The overall mood is protective and secure, rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style with a cool, blue and green color palette.

name: ha-fusion
description: A modern, easy-to-use and performant custom Home Assistant dashboard
readme_summary: ha-fusion is a modern, user-friendly, and performant custom dashboard for Home Assistant, built with Svelte. It offers enhanced control and a visually appealing interface for managing smart home devices.
key_features: Modern, easy-to-use, and performant custom Home Assistant dashboard
Add-on installation for Home Assistant OS/Supervised
Query string support for view and menu control
Debugging logs and browser console inspection
primary_use_case: To provide a customizable and visually appealing dashboard for controlling and monitoring Home Assistant devices and entities.
cover_image_prompt: A digital conductor orchestrating a symphony of smart home devices. The conductor, holding a glowing baton, directs various elements like lights, thermostats, and security cameras that appear as musical notes and instruments. Subtle UI elements of the ha-fusion dashboard are integrated into the conductor's podium, showing data flow and control. The background is a stylized, futuristic home interior with soft, ambient lighting. The overall mood is harmonious and efficient, showcasing seamless control. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and clean lines, emphasizing the ease and elegance of managing a smart home.

name: OMG-Agent
readme_summary: OMG-Agent is an open-source desktop client that enables AI to control Android phones through natural language commands. It integrates with mobile GUI models and uses ADB for real-time interaction, supporting both physical devices and emulators.
key_features: AI-driven mobile GUI operation via natural language
ADB real-time screenshot and task execution
primary_use_case: Automating mobile device operations using AI and natural language commands.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly, anthropomorphic robot hand holding a smartphone, with glowing lines of natural language text flowing from the robot's 'mind' (represented by a subtle brain icon) directly onto the phone's screen, causing apps to open and actions to occur. The background is a clean, modern desk with a small, unobtrusive monitor showing a simplified command interface and a subtle 'OMG-Agent' logo. The overall mood is helpful and intuitive, with a soft, digital glow emanating from the interaction. The art style should be a clean, 3D isometric illustration with a bright, approachable color palette.

name: antares
description: A modern, fast and productivity driven SQL client with a focus in UX
readme_summary: Antares SQL Client is a modern, fast, and user-friendly desktop application for managing multiple SQL databases. Built with Electron.js and Vue.js, it supports various database systems and operating systems, aiming to provide a productive and free alternative for developers.
key_features: Views, triggers, stored routines, functions and schedulers management
primary_use_case: A cross-platform, free, and feature-rich SQL client for developers to manage and interact with various database systems.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan, representing the Antares SQL Client, meticulously crafting intricate gears and mechanisms (representing database tables and structures) on a workbench. The artisan uses specialized tools that glow with digital energy, connecting different colored data streams (representing various SQL databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite) to a central, organized blueprint. Small, subtle UI elements resembling a clean, modern interface are visible on the artisan's tools. The scene is set in a bright, organized workshop with a soft, inviting glow, emphasizing productivity and clarity. The overall style should be a 3D isometric illustration with a clean, modern aesthetic and a focus on the intricate details of the database components being managed.

name: riot
description: Simple and elegant component-based UI library
readme_summary: Riot.js is a lightweight and elegant JavaScript UI library that enables developers to build custom, reusable components using HTML-like syntax. It focuses on simplicity, performance, and close adherence to web standards, making it easy to integrate into existing projects or use as a standalone framework.
key_features: Supports various pre-processors and build tools
Modular ecosystem with tools like CLI, SSR, router, and lazy loading
primary_use_case: Building efficient and maintainable user interfaces with custom, reusable web components using a simple and elegant syntax.
cover_image_prompt: A master craftsman meticulously assembling intricate, glowing building blocks that snap together seamlessly to form a beautiful, functional structure. Each block represents a custom component, and the craftsman's tools subtly resemble code editors. The structure itself is a vibrant, dynamic user interface, with data flowing smoothly between its parts. Small, elegant icons representing web standards and performance hover around the scene. The overall mood is one of effortless creation and elegant design. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style, with clean lines, a bright color palette, and a focus on the seamless integration of components.
